trans-unit.source: Do not display the startup banner or the copyright message.
trans-unit.target: Do not display the startup banner or the copyright message.

trans-unit.source: The configuration to use for building the project. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.
trans-unit.target: The configuration to use for building the project. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.

trans-unit.source: The target framework to build for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: The target framework to build for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.

trans-unit.source: The output directory to place built artifacts in.
trans-unit.target: The output directory to place built artifacts in.

trans-unit.source: The target runtime to build for.
trans-unit.target: The target runtime to build for.

trans-unit.source: Do not build project-to-project references and only build the specified project.
trans-unit.target: Hiermit werden keine Projekt-zu-Projekt-Verweise erstellt, sondern nur das angegebene Projekt wird erstellt.
Hiermit wird keine inkrementelle Erstellung durchgeführt.
